summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CA-Level Financial Statements Workflow application. Backend APIs fully functional (7/7 tests passed). Frontend core functionality working with manual entry mode, statement generation, and step navigation. Minor UI responsiveness issues in schedule tabs.

ui_bugs.issue: Some schedule tabs (Reserves, Fixed Assets) have click timeout issues

integration_issues.issue: Export step (step 8) properly disabled until all prerequisites completed - this is expected behavior

issues: React hydration warnings in console about HTML structure

passed_tests: Homepage loads with correct UI elements
Company Details form (name, financial year, period end date)
Manual Entry mode trial balance entries
Trial balance totals and balance checking
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvements needed: Fix schedule tab click responsiveness and resolve React hydration warnings in console. The application is otherwise fully functional for the core CA workflow.
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (7/7 tests passed), Frontend: ~90% (core functionality working, minor UI issues)
